metadata.title: USN-6240-1 -- FRR vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that FRR incorrectly handled certain messages. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6240-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  frr - 8.4.2-1ubuntu1.2 frr-rpki-rtrlib - 8.4.2-1ubuntu1.2 frr-snmp - 8.4.2-1ubuntu1.2 frr-doc - 8.4.2-1ubuntu1.2 frr-pythontools - 8.4.2-1ubuntu1.2 No subscription required
